pictures.description: The exhibition is “Rei Kawakubo/Comme des Garçons: Art of the In-Between,” and the hosts are Anna Wintour (the gatekeeper for the gala), Tom Brady, Gisele Bündchen, Katy Perry and Pharrell Williams; the honorary chairwomen are Ms. Kawakubo and Caroline Kennedy, the former United States ambassador to Japan.

pictures.title: Evan Rachel Wood
pictures.description: Evan Rachel Wood wearing Altuzarra.

pictures.title: Mindy Kaling
pictures.description: Mindy Kaling wore Prabal Gurung. Anna Wintour hooked her up, she said. How did she arrive? “I took the 6 from NoLIta,” she says.

pictures.description: Daisy Ridley wearing Oscar de la Renta.

pictures.title: Anna Wintour
pictures.description: Anna Wintour, the chairwoman of the Met Gala and one of the first to arrive, wearing Chanel. The last time she wore Comme des Garçons? “Sometime back in the ’80s.”
